00042 void HandleRPCDescription(  )
00043 {
00044       UINT8 ubMercsInSector[ 20 ] = { 0 };
00045       UINT8 ubNumMercs = 0;
00046       UINT8 ubChosenMerc;
00047       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
00048       INT32       cnt2;
00049   BOOLEAN fSAMSite = FALSE;
00050 
00051 
00052       if ( !gTacticalStatus.fCountingDownForGuideDescription )
00053       {
00054             return;
00055       }
00056 
00057   // ATE: postpone if we are not in tactical
00058   if ( guiCurrentScreen != GAME_SCREEN )
00059   {
00060     return;
00061   }
00062 
00063   if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV ) )
00064   {
00065     return;
00066   }
00067 
00068   // Are we a SAM site?
00069   if ( gTacticalStatus.ubGuideDescriptionToUse == 27 || 
00070        gTacticalStatus.ubGuideDescriptionToUse == 30 || 
00071        gTacticalStatus.ubGuideDescriptionToUse == 32 || 
00072        gTacticalStatus.ubGuideDescriptionToUse == 25 || 
00073        gTacticalStatus.ubGuideDescriptionToUse == 31 )
00074   {
00075      fSAMSite = TRUE;  
00076      gTacticalStatus.bGuideDescriptionCountDown = 1;
00077   }
00078 
00079       // ATE; Don't do in combat
00080       if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) && !fSAMSite )
00081       {
00082             return;
00083       }
00084 
00085       // Don't do if enemy in sector
00086       if ( NumEnemyInSector( ) && !fSAMSite )
00087       {
00088             return;
00089       }
00090 
00091 
00092       gTacticalStatus.bGuideDescriptionCountDown--;
00093 
00094       if ( gTacticalStatus.bGuideDescriptionCountDown == 0 )
00095       {     
00096             gTacticalStatus.fCountingDownForGuideDescription = FALSE;
00097 
00098             // OK, count how many rpc guys we have....
00099             // set up soldier ptr as first element in mercptrs list
00100             cnt2 = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;  
00101 
00102             // run through list
00103             for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt2 ]; cnt2 <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt2++,pTeamSoldier++ )
00104             {
00105                   // Add guy if he's a candidate...
00106                   if ( RPC_RECRUITED( pTeamSoldier ) )
00107                   {
00108                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pTeamSoldier->bActive && 
00109                                      pTeamSoldier->sSectorX == gTacticalStatus.bGuideDescriptionSectorX && pTeamSoldier->sSectorY == gTacticalStatus.bGuideDescriptionSectorY &&
00110                                      pTeamSoldier->bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ && 
00111                                      !pTeamSoldier->fBetweenSectors  )
00112                         {           
00113                               if ( pTeamSoldier->ubProfile == IRA || 
00114                                            pTeamSoldier->ubProfile == MIGUEL || 
00115                                            pTeamSoldier->ubProfile == CARLOS || 
00116                                            pTeamSoldier->ubProfile == DIMITRI )
00117                               {
00118                                     ubMercsInSector[ ubNumMercs ] = (UINT8)cnt2;
00119                                     ubNumMercs++;
00120                               }
00121                         }
00122                   }
00123             }
00124 
00125             // If we are > 0
00126             if ( ubNumMercs > 0 )
00127             {
00128                   ubChosenMerc = (UINT8)Random( ubNumMercs );
00129 
00130                   TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( MercPtrs[ ubMercsInSector[ ubChosenMerc ] ], gTacticalStatus.ubGuideDescriptionToUse, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_USE_ALTERNATE_FILES, 0, 0 );
00131             }                       
00132       }
00133 }

00136 void HandleTacticalEndTurn( )
00137 {     
00138       UINT32 cnt;
00139       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
00140       UINT32                        uiTime;
00141   static UINT32 uiTimeSinceLastStrategicUpdate = 0;
00142 
00143       // OK, Do a number of things here....
00144       // Every few turns......
00145 
00146       // Get time elasped
00147       uiTime = GetWorldTotalSeconds( );
00148 
00149   if ( ( uiTimeSinceLastStrategicUpdate - uiTime ) > 1200 )
00150   {
00151             HandleRottingCorpses( );
00152       //DecayTacticalMoraleModifiers();
00153 
00154     uiTimeSinceLastStrategicUpdate = uiTime;
00155   }
00156 
00157       DecayBombTimers( );
00158 
00159       DecaySmokeEffects( uiTime );
00160 
00161       DecayLightEffects( uiTime );
00162 
00163       // Decay smells
00164       //DecaySmells();
00165 
00166       // Decay blood
00167       DecayBloodAndSmells( uiTime );
00168 
00169       // decay AI warning values from corpses
00170       DecayRottingCorpseAIWarnings();
00171 
00172       //Check for enemy pooling (add enemies if there happens to be more than the max in the
00173       //current battle.  If one or more slots have freed up, we can add them now.
00174       AddPossiblePendingEnemiesToBattle();
00175 
00176       AddPossiblePendingMilitiaToBattle();
00177       
00178       // Loop through each active team and decay public opplist...
00179       // May want this done every few times too
00180       NonCombatDecayPublicOpplist( uiTime );
00181       /*
00182       for( cnt = 0; cnt < MAXTEAMS; cnt++ )
00183       {
00184             if ( gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bMenInSector > 0 )
00185             {
00186                   // decay team's public opplist
00187                   DecayPublicOpplist( (INT8)cnt );                
00188             }     
00189       }
00190 */
00191 
00192       // First pass:
00193       // Loop through our own mercs:
00194       //    Check things like ( even if not in our sector )
00195       //          1 ) All updates of breath, shock, bleeding, etc
00196       //    2 ) Updating First AID, etc
00197       //  ( If in our sector: )
00198       //          3 ) Update things like decayed opplist, etc
00199 
00200       // Second pass:
00201       //  Loop through all mercs in tactical engine
00202       //  If not a player merc ( ubTeam ) , do things like 1 , 2 , 3 above
00203 
00204 
00205       // First exit if we are not in realtime combat or realtime noncombat
00206       if (!(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00207       {
00208 
00209             BeginLoggingForBleedMeToos( TRUE );
00210 
00211             cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00212             for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
00213             {     
00214                   if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bLife > 0 && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && !( AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) ) )
00215                   {
00216                         // Handle everything from getting breath back, to bleeding, etc
00217                         EVENT_BeginMercTurn( pSoldier, TRUE, 0 );
00218 
00219                         // Handle Player services
00220                         HandlePlayerServices( pSoldier );
00221 
00222                         // if time is up, turn off xray
00223                         if ( pSoldier->uiXRayActivatedTime && uiTime > pSoldier->uiXRayActivatedTime + XRAY_TIME )
00224                         {
00225                               TurnOffXRayEffects( pSoldier );
00226                         }
00227 
00228                         // Handle stat changes if ness.
00229                         //if ( fCheckStats )
00230                         //{
00231                         ////  UpdateStats( pSoldier );
00232                         //}
00233                   }
00234             }
00235 
00236             BeginLoggingForBleedMeToos( FALSE );
00237 
00238             // OK, loop through the mercs to perform 'end turn' events on each...
00239             // We're looping through only mercs in tactical engine, ignoring our mercs
00240             // because they were done earilier...
00241             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumMercSlots; cnt++ )
00242             {
00243                   pSoldier = MercSlots[ cnt ];
00244 
00245                   if ( pSoldier != NULL )
00246                   {
00247                         if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
00248                         {
00249                               // Handle everything from getting breath back, to bleeding, etc
00250                               EVENT_BeginMercTurn( pSoldier, TRUE, 0 );
00251                               
00252                               // Handle Player services
00253                               HandlePlayerServices( pSoldier );
00254                         }
00255                   }
00256             }
00257       }
00258 
00259       HandleRPCDescription( );
00260 
00261 }
